item.title: Our Town + NATIVE
item.dc:creator: First Last
item.description: Hey friends! Check out Isle of Printing’s feature in the local Nashville publication: NATIVE. Our fearless leader, Bryce McCloud, talks about Our Town and the bigger public art picture! Enjoy and join in on the conversation!.
item.content:encoded:
Hey friends! Check out Isle of Printing’s feature in the local Nashville publication: NATIVE. Our fearless leader, Bryce McCloud, talks about Our Town and the bigger public art picture!
Enjoy and join in on the conversation!.

item.title: Our Town + Instagram
item.dc:creator: First Last
item.description: Over at Our Town HQ (aka Isle of Printing) we do our best to stay hip to the new social times. One of our favorite ways of doing so is via Instagram. We post photos from all of our events AND give updates on our growing gallery of printed portraits that could one day be […]
item.content:encoded:
Over at Our Town HQ (aka Isle of Printing) we do our best to stay hip to the new social times. One of our favorite ways of doing so is via Instagram. We post photos from all of our events AND give updates on our growing gallery of printed portraits that could one day be yours for the price of your self-portrait donation! So please follow us, if you’re so inclined. We promise not to disappoint — Public Art will be seen and shared! Also, if you attend an event, make a portrait and/or take photos, please feel free to tag and hashtag us! Thanks for your support, Nashville! Hope to see you soon, face to face!

@ourtownbikecart
#ourtownnashville.

item.title: Our Town + Nashville Public Radio
item.dc:creator: First Last
item.description: WPLN’s Nina Cardona spent the afternoon with the Our Town bike cart and crew as they made art and conversation with the folks over at Room in the Inn. Check the story out here..
item.content:encoded:
WPLN’s Nina Cardona spent the afternoon with the Our Town bike cart and crew as they made art and conversation with the folks over at Room in the Inn.

Check the story out here..
